MajorClaims.Text: parents are really the best teachers who give us much knowledge and advice

Claims.Text: parents are the first teachers who teach babies how to walk and speak and make children to become a good person
parents provide their children the best social skills and knowledge in order to prepare for their children's future life
children are taught basic things, which influence their whole life, by their parents
parents train their child how to become a good person
parents' support is one factor which makes people succeed in their life

Premises.Text: As a baby, they do not know any thing all around but they learn everything from their parents
Parents always try to explain and describe tenderly all things in simple way so that their baby can understand and learn from that
parents bring the whole world of wonderful and colorful thing into their baby's little mind
They always make their children basically say thanks and apology in the right way
it is common that they try to explain who is a good or bad person
children are shown how to behave well with others
this can influence positively their future children and makes children's behavior better before they face the real world
parents are ones who loves their children most and always take care of their children
they tend to provide the best knowledge and advice from their experience for children
Unlike a professional, parents always support children and give them much social skill so they can communicate well with others and have good habit in life
